|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "1242-00000263-01Z" is silkscreened on the board. The FCC test report lists the following as identical models.. *Edimax EW-7206APg / GAP-E06G *LevelOne WAP-0006 *Longshine LCS-WA5-40 *Hawking HWREG1 / HWBA54G *MINITAR MNWAPG *TONZE AW-6200R *PheeNet WAP-554G *JAHT WP-4001BR *Conceptronic C54APM *Intellinet 501903 *Asbis CN-WFAP *Sandberg 131-01 *2 Direct WL0027 *Planet WAP-4033 *Micronet SP918GKV5 ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Info derived from==== These serial logs are from the '''Intellinet''' branded unit shown above. {{SCollapse|boot log |
